detail_desc: Long, double-breasted coat in sturdy faux fur with a large collar and diagonal side pockets. Lined.
Jumpers in soft, fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and buttons running diagonally at the top of one shoulder.

Cotton poplin shirt with a button-down collar, open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Cotton canvas shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake leg pockets with a flap.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Shirt in a slightly stretchy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves.

Slim-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details and an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y). Zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft, chunky knit containing some wool with long, slightly wider sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons on one shoulder, 3/4-length sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a large faux fur pompom on the top.
Ankle boots with a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
A pair of metal hoop earrings.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets and ribbed hems.
Slip-on fabric trainers with a decorative knot detail at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Short dress in a jacquard weave with a slight sheen. Double-layered stand-up collar and an opening at the back with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Short, raglan puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and a seam at the waist with a narrow drawstring that ties at the back. Lined.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections at the crotch, back and sides. Elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and zipped side pockets.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with buttons at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Fully lined bikini. Top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that fasten at the back of the neck, a wide flounce with laser-cut scalloped edges, and a plastic fastener at the back. Small metal decoration on one strap. Bottoms with laser-cut scalloped edges.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar, covered buttons at the back of the neck and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Elasticated satin scrunchie with a scarf detail.

Ankle-length trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, flap leg pockets with buttons and fake welt back pockets. Tapered legs with elasticated smocking at the hems.

prod_name: Beverly HW Loose Mom Fit Dnm
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas insoles and patterned rubber soles.
Fully lined, patterned bikini with frills. Top with an adjustable tie at the back of the neck and a plastic fastener at the back.
Swim cap with a peak at the front and a flap at the back to protect the back of the neck.

Padded all-in-one suit in woven fabric. Fixed hood with ear appliqués on top and a zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Mitts and feet that can be folded over to keep the hands and feet warm. Lined. The polyester content of the suit is recycled.

Platform sandals with open toes, crossover foot straps and an adjustable ankle strap with concealed elastication and a round metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles. Platform front approx. 2 cm. Heel 9.5 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the tops is organic.

Blouse in an airy organic cotton weave with inset lace trims and pin-tucks at the front. Small, frilled collar, an opening and button at the back of the neck, a V-shaped frill trim at the front and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim – a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Leggings in stretch, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.

Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Rain jacket in waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and an all-over print. Detachable hood with an elasticated front edge, press-studs down the front, a reflective detail, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Scarf in a soft, checked weave with fringes along the sides. Size 90x190 cm.
Tops in organic cotton jersey with a gathered neckline and short puff sleeves.

Biker jacket in imitation leather with quilted, padded sections on the shoulders. Small stand-up collar with a press-stud, a diagonal zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Recycled polyester lining.
Hat in a soft rib knit.

Single-breasted jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels and buttoning at the front. Fake pocket with a decorative handkerchief at the top and fake flap pockets at the front. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Trousers in sturdy twill made from a cotton and Tencel™ lyocell blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Fake front pockets, a fake back pocket with a flap and decorative button, and tapered legs.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Slim legs with narrow hems.
Top in washed linen with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back, and buttons down the front.
Short shorts in soft, patterned viscose jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey with a frilled V-neck and a seam and ties under the bust and 3/4-length sleeves with a frill at the cuffs.

Dress in a patterned weave with a frilled collar, gathered yoke and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Scarf in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides.
Short-sleeved lace nursing dress. Wrapover front with a jersey inner top for easier nursing access. Jersey lining.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with wide ribbing around the neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Lightweight trainers with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Jersey linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Shirt in a patterned weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with covered elastication, a small frill trim and decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey with a sheen. Stand-up collar, an opening at the front and a small opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Padded shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam below the bust and gathered seams in the sides for a draped effect. Unlined.
5-pocket trousers in washed, stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Super skinny fit.

Lightweight windbreaker in woven fabric with a print motif. Detachable, mesh-lined hood, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Discreet pockets in the side seams and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Partly lined in fleece.
Long-sleeved appliquéd dress with a fine-knit top, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Cardigan knitted in soft cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, decorative front pockets, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Dress in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with a round neck, picot-trimmed puff sleeves and a sewn-in bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey with elastication and a flounce at the top.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.

Shaping. Jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the hips, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a small frill at the top, and wide 3/4-length raglan sleeves with a frill trim.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy jersey with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and zip at the back.

Calf-length dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a deep V-neck and short puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with slits in the sides. Partly lined in jersey.

Bag in woven fabric with a two-way zip at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle and carabiner hook. One zipped mesh outer compartment and two mesh inner compartments. Lined. Size 22x29 cm.

Stretch cotton twill cargo joggers in a relaxed fit with a zip fly and button and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, back pockets and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud, and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a belt at the waist and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved Henley shirt in soft, textured cotton jersey with a small collar, button placket and chest pocket.
Straight-cut jacket in a soft, textured weave with notch lapels and a button decorated with a pearly bead at the front. Patch front pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill. Slightly looser fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide legs.

Short, wide dress in jersey crêpe with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest and front pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined.
Santa hat with a faux fur pompom on top and wide, covered elastication around the hem.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton and linen weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
